title: Angular starter template
description: Angular starter template in an nx workspace using scully.io. The studio and website will be deployed on Netlify. You can use it as website, blog or even a webshop. All these three different types are prepared in this starter template. It also includes common SEO techniques like meta tags, sitemap, ...

sites.title: Sanity Studio
sites.description: The Sanity Studio is where you edit and structure your content.

buildSettings.cmd: npm run build && cp netlify.toml dist

sites.title: Pre-rendered angular client
sites.description: This is your final website, blog or webshop. It is built with angular and generates a static site using scully.io

buildSettings.cmd: npm run build && npm run scully
